text:
Has anyone successfully used a *GDPR compliant* *alternative* *to Googles reCaptcha* *for HubSpot forms* to avoid spam submissions?
We are based in Europe and can’t use reCaptcha for HubSpot forms since it is not GDPR compliant.
At the moment this is kind of a show stopper for us.
Anyone any idea how to solve this issue?
Do you know of a way on how to use *HCaptcha* for example?
If you need this yourself, please kindly upvote this HubSpot Idea:
<https://community.HubSpot.com/t5/HubSpot-Ideas/Add-alternatives-to-the-default-Google-captcha-tool-on-forms/idi-p/637210>

Hello All,
Good Day!
I have created HubSpot app and developer app both. Meanwhile I have register one webhook in developer app which should trigger while contact is created in HubSpot app. Can any one help me to resolve this issue?

Hub Id: 24444209
Developer Hub Id: 42220210
Hub Subscription: Sales Hub Professional.

Thanks in advance

Hello Timothy,
It's a long time subject (<https://community.HubSpot.com/t5/GDPR/How-to-use-captcha-with-HubSpot-form-and-be-GDPR-compliant/m-p/516459>) At this moment, the only one way is that you can manage by yourself one javascript code based on form submission, you can find few example (not captcha but form validation) here : <https://legacydocs.HubSpot.com/docs/methods/forms/advanced_form_options>

Happy Monday, HubSpot Devs! A reminder that if you're attending INBOUND this year - please join us in <#C05GQ0GCMAM|inbound23>. We'll soon start sharing dev-specific info on how to have the best experience at this year's event! We're excited, there's lots of good stuff in the works for developers this year :slightly_smiling_face:
is there a tutorial that shows how to create a dynamic page using hubdb?

Is there a way to lift the requirement of having coded files smaller than 1.5 MiB? Using the react starter boiler plate.
`[HubSpotAutoUploadPlugin] line 0: Coded files must be smaller than 1.5 MiB`
Ask in <#CBNDYJJAZ|jobs>...someone will reach out to you!
Hello all! Is there any service to create meetings for custom development? Like this <https://meetings.HubSpot.com/n> ? Thanks! :smile:
Yeah seems like this topic has been on for some time. Pretty annoying if your asking me. Thank you for your help, I will have a look.
